channel.title: Mac on SpiderSoft
channel.description: Recent content in Mac on SpiderSoft

item.title: MacBook Pro can’t connect to 5 GHz wireless N network
item.description: That one was tricky. Got brand-new router and couldn’t connect to 5 Ghz network. My iPhone didn’t have this issues, neither couple other devices at home. I spend some time randomly changing settings on wireless network, and then I found tricky information – my MacBook can’t use all available channels, can work only on specific one.
